Name: TruthGundlach
Text: New converts to the “negative US yields are imminent” crowd were out in force today just before the 30 yr UST price decline began.  Classic.

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: And yet, commentary in mainstream media this past week pushed a narrative that the Fed should raise rates due to economy “overheating”. Wow.

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Obviously the US economy is not “overheating”. Many inputs to the Conference Board’s Leading Economic Indicators are worse now than in 2007.
